InsurancePolicyTransaction.name: InsurancePolicyTransaction
InsurancePolicyTransaction.description: Represents a transaction related to a change that affects the premium of an insurance policy, such as an endorsement, renewal, or cancellation.

Category.description: Specifies the transaction category for the insurance policy.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from when the transaction becomes effective.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy this transaction is related to.

InsurancePolicyVersionId.description: The current version of the insurance policy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ParentTransactionId.description: The transaction this insurance policy transaction is related to. For example, a charge transaction is the parent transaction for a payment made against that charge.

PostedDate.description: The date when the customer was charged for the insurance policy.

Status.description: The current status of a policy transaction.

TotalTransactionAmount.description: The total amount of transaction, including transaction fee and tax.

TransactionFeeAmount.description: The prorated fee for the transaction.

TransactionNumber.description: An identifier for the transaction from an external system.

TransactionPostedDate.description: The date on which the amount was charged to the customer.

TransactionTaxAmount.description: The prorated tax on the transaction amount.
